intro: Mikania nebularum, commonly known as the cloudleaf morning glory, is a flowering plant native to Central and South America. It is a member of the Convolvulaceae family and is characterized by its rapid growth and climbing habit. The plant produces showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that are typically blue or purple in color. Its leaves are heart-shaped and often have a fuzzy texture. Mikania nebularum is also known for its ability to thrive in a variety of soil types and its use in traditional medicine.
